alert.note: Alert for Clark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 9:29PM CDT until May 18 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Missouri...Iowa... Mississippi River at Gregory Landing, Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Le Claire LD14, Fulton LD13, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, and Dubuque. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Gregory Landing. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Water affects the road north of the grain elevator in Gregory Landing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 16.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday evening and continue falling to 13.7 feet next Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning.
